result.title: Divisor problem â€” Need help
result.content:
https://www.codechef.com/COSE2015/problems/CSTRIKE2

Hello.I want to know if there is any better algorithm than O(max_value*sqrt(max_value)) Or O(n*sqrt(max_value)) per testcase. From all AC sources,I see they fix the gcd and do maxv/gcd operations,which leads to maxv/1 + maxv/2 +.. maxv/maxv,which leads to maxv*sqrt(maxv). These are not legit solutions(which should get AC within 1 s time limit)

Is there any way faster algorithm?Thank you! :)
